name: Zombie Football (CradleDev) (CradleDev)
description:
Football is the world’s most popular ball game in numbers of participants and spectators. 

Zombie Football is a new fun PC game in which two teams of 4 players each(3 in-field players and a goalkeeper), using feet, try to maneuver the ball into the opposing team’s goal to win the game. Only the goalkeeper is permitted to handle the ball by hand and may do so only within the penalty area surrounding the goal. The team that scores more goals wins. Zombie Football is an interesting single player soccer game with interesting  gameplay,nice controls and a captivating atmosphere. This classic game allows you to play against artificially controlled zombie opponents to test your skills.The game is very fun and engaging and will definitely require your concentration to battle your opponents and emerge victorious. The game is also fast paced and whenever you become idle during the game your opponents score. Every match lasts 4 minutes and will keep your brain engaged all the time

Gameplay

The gameplay in Zombie soccer involves one team that has possession of the ball dribbling the ball amongst themselves to try and get to where they can kick  the ball into the goal.The winner at the end of the designated time is the team with the most goals. You can also take the ball from the opponent when they have possession and they can also take it from you.

Key Features

  • Exciting Gameplay
  • Easy to use controls
  • Nice Atmosphere
  • Enjoyable
  • Colourful

Control

Movement-AWSD or Arrows

Z - Shoot

Space - Switch players

P - Pause game

F - Fullscreen

How to score

Use the space bar to switch player and decidec who gets to get the ball. Run with the ball until you are in the opponents half and when the shoot zone suggestion appears press Z to score. Use the Movement keys to dribble around.
